name: ListDepartments
description:
Retrieve a list of all departments.

Use this tool to get a complete list of all departments within the organization. Requires appropriate permissions.

parameters.name: department_request_body
parameters.description: A JSON object containing optional parameters: includeArchived (boolean to include archived departments), cursor (for pagination), syncToken (for incremental sync), and limit (maximum number of departments to return).

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Ashby API
